name: Adamastor (Cape Giant)
shortLoreBlurb: Adamastor (Cape Giant) is a monster from Cape of Storms associated with ocean, storms. Linked to tempests and the rule of kings. Appeased for safe passage and rains.

description: Adamastor (Cape Giant) is a monster from Cape of Storms associated with ocean, storms. Linked to tempests and the rule of kings. Appeased for safe passage and rains.
